summary: This is an email from court reporter Paula Speer transmitting the public portion of a transcript from a hearing in the case US v. Maxwell (20-cr-330) on November 10, 2021. It notes that a sealed portion of the transcript will be sent separately.

persons.name: Paula Speer
persons.context: She is the sender of the email, transmitting the public portion of the court transcript for the case US v. Maxwell.

events.title: Hearing in US v. Maxwell
events.description: A court hearing was held in the case US v. Maxwell (20-cr-330). The public portion of the transcript was released via email.

keyFacts: A hearing was held on November 10, 2021, in the criminal case US v. Maxwell (docket 20-cr-330).
The court transcript from the hearing has both a public portion and a sealed portion.
Court reporter Paula Speer was responsible for distributing the transcript via email.
